about_the_game:
A Magical Action RPG + Strategy, Building & Raiding & Battling Adventure!
Discover your powers and defend the homeland in Elder’s Grace, Unchained.

BUILD - Craft traps, minions & defense materials to unleash foreboding stronghold designs, safeguarding the riches within. Thwart invaders and the bounty is yours.

RAID - Prepare specialized teams through quests, clashes & even breeding. Fight through live action battles, find the treasure & it’s yours to keep.

BATTLE - Play Last Mobley Standing, an epic PvPvE mode where there can only be one winner! It’s a battle to the end where everyone is Playing for Keeps!

In a selfless act to save their homeland from monstrous invaders, the Elder Mobley harnessed the magic of the land, yielding fantastical powers but costing the ultimate price - their lives. Through their sacrifice, a new generation of Mobley is born, now with powers unchained.

It’s your turn to find the magic within and defend the homeland once more. Protect your treasure and embark on epic battling adventures in Elder’s Grace, Unchained.
detailed_description:
A Magical Action RPG + Strategy, Building & Raiding & Battling Adventure!
Discover your powers and defend the homeland in Elder’s Grace, Unchained.

BUILD - Craft traps, minions & defense materials to unleash foreboding stronghold designs, safeguarding the riches within. Thwart invaders and the bounty is yours.

RAID - Prepare specialized teams through quests, clashes & even breeding. Fight through live action battles, find the treasure & it’s yours to keep.

BATTLE - Play Last Mobley Standing, an epic PvPvE mode where there can only be one winner! It’s a battle to the end where everyone is Playing for Keeps!

In a selfless act to save their homeland from monstrous invaders, the Elder Mobley harnessed the magic of the land, yielding fantastical powers but costing the ultimate price - their lives. Through their sacrifice, a new generation of Mobley is born, now with powers unchained.

It’s your turn to find the magic within and defend the homeland once more. Protect your treasure and embark on epic battling adventures in Elder’s Grace, Unchained.

name: Elders Grace - Unchained

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 860
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2000 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 11
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 960
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4000 MB available space

short_description: Elder’s Grace, Unchained is a magical ACTION RPG meets Strategy, BUILDING & RAIDING & BATTLING game. Create customized treasure strongholds. Build teams to plunder others or battle until there’s only one.
supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Arabic*, Indonesian*, Japanese*, Korean*, Portuguese - Brazil*, Russian*, Simplified Chinese*, Spanish - Latin America*, Thai*, Traditional Chinese*, Turkish*, Ukrainian*, Vietnamese*, Filipino*, Greek*, Polish*, Portuguese - Portugal*, Urdu*
*languages with full audio support
